change.item: This is the first version of the encoded finding aid.

did.head: Summary Information
did.abstract: Consists of radio scripts collected by psychologist William Wokoun, 1931-1984. The scripts are mostly for NBC-affiliated, Chicago-based programs and were collected by Wokoun when he worked part-time at the Merchandise Mart in Chicago as a high school and college student.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The Wokoun mss., 1941-1953, consists of radio scripts collected by psychologist William Wokoun, 1931-1984. Wokoun worked at the Human Engineering Laboratory for the U.S. Army and in 1968 he became director of human factors at Muzak, Inc. There he conducted research on the effects of music on productivity. He later became president of B.W. Research Laboratories, Inc., a research and consulting firm that uses psychological techniques to solve human factors and communications problems.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged alphabetically by show title, followed by miscellaneous items.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The scripts are mostly for NBC-affiliated, Chicago-based programs and were collected by Wokoun when he worked part-time at the Merchandise Mart in Chicago as a high school and college student. The collection contains scripts from such radio serials as The Guiding Light, Captain Midnight, Lone Journey, Ma Perkins, Masquerade, The Road of Life, Today's Children, Vic and Sade, and Woman in White. Also included are emcee scripts for music and variety shows, and commercial scripts for various products and companies. An inventory is available.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in IUCAT, the IU Libraries' online catalog. Materials about related topics, persons or places can be found by searching the catalog using these terms.

userestrict.head: Usage Restrictions
userestrict.p: Prior arrangements are not necessary before coming to the Library, however, patrons from out of town are encouraged to communicate with the Library in advance of their visits to ascertain availability of materials.
Photocopying permitted only with permission of the Curator of Manuscripts, Lilly Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item], Wokoun mss., Lilly Library, Indiana University, Bloomington, Indiana.

scopecontent.p: Arranged alphabetically by title of program, followed by a Miscellaneous section. CN = Continuity Number. JN = Job Number.
